EmailTemplate.description: Notification to requestor and approver that the form has been recalled.
EmailTemplate.name: Development Sandbox Request Recall Notification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Forms__c.Form_Type__c}: "{!Forms__c.Name__c}" Recalled
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ApprovalRequest.Process_Assignee},
A form, {!Forms__c.Form_Type__c}: "{!Forms__c.Name__c}", has been recalled.
Thank you,
{!User.Name}
